formatted_address: #B2-232/233 2 Bayfront Avenue The Shoppes At, 2 Bayfront Ave, B2M - 232, Singapore 018972
name: Shanghai Tang

reviews.text:
We had a wonderful experience at Shanghai Tang at MBS. Abbie was incredibly friendly and helpful. She went above and beyond to assist us, suggesting sizes and tailoring options for our big day.

We also appreciated her assistance with our mall membership app. Her attention to detail and willingness to help made our shopping experience not just enjoyable but also memorable :)

Thank you, Abbie!

I appreciate the innovative and resourceful approach that Caspian took to ensure exceptional customer service during my recent online purchase. I personally wanted to thank him for his enthusiastic efforts in following up with me. His exceptional service during my visit to the store was remarkable as he displayed remarkable patience and willingness to assist me in finding solutions for my upcoming D&D. Thank you, and I am eagerly looking forward to making another purchase soon.

Lovely clothes. never heard of this clothing company before . my son in law  as got quite  a few of there polo shirts. and surprisingly I got on for Christmas which was  unexpected. a beautiful navy blue one
An incredibly kind, helpful and knowledgable lady talked me through a beautiful collection of clothes. A store I hope to return to. Highly recommend.

It is a beautiful brand and I like their products (the ones that I can afford).

Store is very upscale and service is top notch.

vicinity: #B2-232/233 2 Bayfront Avenue The Shoppes At, 2 Bayfront Avenue, B2M - 232, Singapore
